generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, adjacent to the building, with a person standing on it.
- building: A multi-story building with windows and a satellite dish is visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Numerous trees are visible along the sides of the road and in the background.
- person: A person is standing on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- rider: A person is riding a bicycle in the middle of the road.
- car: A dark-colored car is visible in the distance, driving away from the camera.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road, near the traffic light.
- pole: A pole is visible on the right side of the road, supporting the traffic light.
- bicycle: A bicycle is being ridden by a person in the middle of the road.
